effect_entries.effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move
last used by the target by cutting 4 PP
from it.

The user unleashes its grudge on the move

from it.
